!!Not implemented yet

XSD3bGui can read from and write to UML - XMI files.s. 
All Xsd3bImportFromUml is performed by the Xsd3bPlugin Dl3bak.Xsd3b.Uml14Xmi12Import.dll.

!!!!supported fileformats
	* xmi1.2/uml1.4 (ArgoUml 0.24)
		* xmlns:UML = 'org.omg.xmi.namespace.UML' 
		* *.xmi and *.uml (from argouml. *.zargo not supported)
	* xmi1.1/uml1.3/ (StarUml 5.0)
		* xmlns:UML="href://org.omg/UML/1.3"
		* *.xmi ( *.uml from staruml not supported)

case matters

!!!!Mapping between uml and xsd3b
	* UML:Class with stereotype <<Table>>			==> TableDefinition
		* Templateparameter/TaggedValue TableName=xxx (casesensitive)
			* Table is renamed to xxx
			* TableAlias is set to last original name
			* OriginalName is set to first original name
			* fields of classes  with same TableName are merged to one Table (aka "one table per classhirarchy")
		* TableName, TableComment, DBTableType <= stereotype,  UMLNamespace
		* Tables without Attributes are removed
		* autocreate <<AutoInnc> PK if table has none

	* UML:Attribute						==> FieldDefinition
		* FieldName. FieldComment, DataType , DBFieldType <= stereotype
		* StringSize <= TaggedValue[MaxSize]=xxx (casesensitive, Not Supported by StarUML)
		* AllowDBNull if cardinality 0..
		* ReadOnly	if changeability!="changeable"
		* DefaultValue only if not AllowDBNull
		* NullValue is DefaultValue if AllowDBNull
		* UniqueValue is true if stereotype <<Unique>>
		* AutoIncrement and PrimaryKeyNumber and UniqueValue is true if stereotype <<AutoInc>>
			* AutoIncrementSeed <= TaggedValue AutoIncSeed=xxx (casesensitive, Not Supported by StarUML). Default is 1
			* AutoIncrementStep <= TaggedValue AutoIncStep=xxx (casesensitive, Not Supported by StarUML). Default is 1
		* PrimaryKeyNumber and UniqueValue set if stereotype <<pk>>

	* UML:Generalization
		* inherit Datacolums from Superclass if Superclass has no stereotype <<Table>>

	* UML:Whole Part
		* subtypes
			* UML:Association[.//@aggregation='none']		=> parent 1:1
			* UML:Association[.//@aggregation='composite']	=> non-nested master/detail
			* UML:Association[.//@aggregation='aggregate']	=> nested master/detail ( IsNested = true )
		* members
			* Inherits foreign keys from master
			* foreign keys nullable if cardinality is 0..
			* ExportParentAlias and ExportGetChildrenAlias <= assoziationname
			* RelationComment, DBRelationType <= stereotype

		
!ToDO Mapping between uml and xsd3b

	* UML:Class with stereotype <<Table>>			==> Datatable
		* ExportDataRowAlias give the item or xxxRow a different name.
		* ExportDataTableAlias give the collection or xxxDataTable a different name.
		
	* UML:Generalization
		* association to Superclass if Superclass has stereotype <<Table>>

	 * UML:Whole Part
		* Support for many to many relations
---
see also
	* Xsd3bExportToUml 
	* Xsd3bImportFromUml 
	* StereotypeSupport
